scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: 1984 Labor Notes Calendar ; Buffalo Area Economy, Who's in Charge? ; Rochester Labor Calendar 1984 ; 1982 Buffalo Labor Calendar (2) ; Buffalo labor Calendar 1985 ; Equal Employment Opportunity is the Law (2) ; Kinsey Photographer 1979 ; We Make Our Own History, 1935-1985
